name: EducationLevel
title: Education Level
description: Determination of the highest level of education achieved by the patient. (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Education Level.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an determination of the highest level of education achieved by the patient..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Education Level.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Education Level.)

contains.display: What is the highest grade or level of school you have completed or the highest degree you have received [NHANES]
